scripts.build:html: cross-env NODE_ENV=production twig-cli "src/html/**/*.html.twig" --base src/html/ --output build/ && ncp src/html/img build/img
scripts.development: cross-env NODE_ENV=development postcss src/css/*.css -d build/css && twig-cli "src/html/**/*.html.twig" --base src/html/ --output build/ && ncp src/html/img build/img
scripts.production: cross-env NODE_ENV=production postcss src/css/*.css -d build/css --ext min.css && node compress.js
